com.xith3d.collider
Class ColliderNode

java.lang.Object
  com.xith3d.collider.ColliderNode
public class ColliderNode
extends Object

Node for linking a scenegraph node to a collider for insertion into the collision system.

Originally Coded by David Yazel on Dec 22, 2003 at 8:44:42 PM.

Constructor Detail

ColliderNode

public ColliderNode(Node node,
                    int colliderType,
                    int collideeType,
                    boolean isMovable,
                    Collider collider,
                    Coord3f ellipsoid)
Constructs a collider node for inserting into the collision system.

Parameters:
node - The node hierarchy representing the collider
isMovable - If this is true then the node's transform group can be altered by the
colliderType - The type of object to use when this impacts another object. using CT_GEOMETRY can be extremely expensive
collideeType - The type of object to use when then object is impacted by another. For static objects CT_GEOMETRY is the most accurate. collision system if necessary. Static and dynamic colliders are handled differently for efficiency.

applyForces

public void applyForces(long time)
this method will apply whatever forces are necessary to calculate a new velocity vector. This can be overridden to apply any sort of calculations, but the default behavior is to iterator over the registered forces and apply them.
